title: The Faces of patriots
creator_credit: Gene Feldman and Wombat Productions, Inc.
brief_description: Portrays how different people view patriotism by showing an anti-war rally in Washington, D.C. and a gathering in White Plains, N.Y., at which people re-enact a Revolutionary War battle. Designed to stimulate students to deepen their own understanding of patriotism, what it is and how it can be shown.
